梂字的基本解释

梂
qiú
栎的果实。

梂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiú］
［《廣韻》巨鳩切，平尤，羣。］
(1)植物包裹子实的球状外壳。
(2)指栎实。

梂字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　梂； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页528第04
【唐韻】巨鳩切【集韻】【類篇】【韻會】渠尤切，?音求。【說文】櫟實。【爾雅·釋木】櫟，其實梂。【註】有梂彙自裹。【疏】梂，盛實之房也。　又【唐本草】羊梂子。【蘇頌·圖經】棠梂子皆山?也。　又【說文】梂，一曰鑿首。　又【博雅】柎也。　又【集韻】拘玉切，音拲。又居六切，音匊。又渠竹切，音踘。義?同。

梂字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
梂字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Bang
qiú
The fruit of the oak.
Bang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiú］
["Guangyun" Giant Dove Cut, Ping You, Group. ]
(1) The spherical shell of the plant wrapper.
(2) Refers to Quercus.
Bang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　梂; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 528 04
[Tang Yun] Giant Dove Cut [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter] [Rhyme Meeting] Qu Youqie, please? [Said the text] Quercus. [Erya Shimu] Quercus, in fact, sing. [Note] There is a self-wrapped remittance. 【Sparse】Zhang, Shengshi’s house is also.　[Tang Materia Medica] Sheep Bangzi. [Su Song·Picture Classic] Tang Bingzi are all mountains?　 [Said the text] Zeng again, one said to chisel the head.　[Bo Ya] Chi Ye.　 [Ji Yun] Yu cut, the sound is mixed. It's in six cuts again, and it's sound. Then he cut the bamboo, and the sound was repeated. Righteous? Same.
